001package ca.gc.cra.radar.adapter.kafka;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.capture.SegmentRecord;
004import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
005import java.time.Duration;
006import java.util.Base64;
007import java.util.Iterator;
008import java.util.Objects;
009import java.util.Optional;
010import java.util.Properties;
011import java.util.UUID;
012import org.apache.kafka.clients.consumer.Consumer;
013import org.apache.kafka.clients.consumer.ConsumerConfig;
014import org.apache.kafka.clients.consumer.KafkaConsumer;
015import org.apache.kafka.clients.consumer.ConsumerRecord;
016import org.apache.kafka.clients.consumer.ConsumerRecords;
017import org.apache.kafka.common.serialization.ByteArrayDeserializer;
018import org.apache.kafka.common.serialization.StringDeserializer;
019
020/**
021 * Kafka consumer wrapper that streams {@link SegmentRecord} instances from a topic.
022 * <p>Belongs to the infrastructure layer for Assemble pipelines. Not thread-safe; each instance
023 * owns a dedicated {@link Consumer}.
024 *
025 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
026 */
027public final class KafkaSegmentReader implements AutoCloseable {
028  private final Consumer<String, byte[]> consumer;
029
030  /**
031   * Creates a segment reader bound to the specified Kafka topic.
032   *
033   * @param bootstrapServers comma-separated Kafka bootstrap servers
034   * @param topic topic containing serialized segment records
035   * @throws NullPointerException if {@code bootstrapServers} is {@code null}
036   * @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code bootstrapServers} is blank or {@code topic} is {@code null} or blank
037   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
038   */
039  public KafkaSegmentReader(String bootstrapServers, String topic) {
040    this(createConsumer(bootstrapServers), topic);
041  }
042
043  KafkaSegmentReader(Consumer<String, byte[]> consumer, String topic) {
044    this.consumer = Objects.requireNonNull(consumer, "consumer");
045    String sanitizedTopic = sanitizeTopic(topic);
046    this.consumer.subscribe(java.util.List.of(sanitizedTopic));
047  }
048
049  /**
050   * Polls Kafka for the next segment record.
051   *
052   * @param timeout maximum time to wait for a record
053   * @return next segment record when available; otherwise empty
054   * @throws NullPointerException if {@code timeout} is {@code null}
055   * @implNote Skips malformed records quietly to keep the stream progressing.
056   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
057   */
058  public Optional<SegmentRecord> poll(Duration timeout) {
059    ConsumerRecords<String, byte[]> records = consumer.poll(timeout);
060    Iterator<ConsumerRecord<String, byte[]>> iterator = records.iterator();
061    while (iterator.hasNext()) {
062      ConsumerRecord<String, byte[]> record = iterator.next();
063      try {
064        return Optional.of(deserialize(record.value()));
065      } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
066        // Skip malformed payloads but continue consuming.
067      }
068    }
069    return Optional.empty();
070  }
071
072  /**
073   * Closes the underlying Kafka consumer after flushing outstanding commits.
074   *
075   * @implNote Waits up to five seconds for the consumer to close cleanly.
076   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
077   */
078  @Override
079  public void close() {
080    consumer.close(Duration.ofSeconds(5));
081  }
082
083  private static Consumer<String, byte[]> createConsumer(String bootstrapServers) {
084    Objects.requireNonNull(bootstrapServers, "bootstrapServers");
085    String trimmed = bootstrapServers.trim();
086    if (trimmed.isEmpty()) {
087      throw new IllegalArgumentException("bootstrapServers must not be blank");
088    }
089    Properties props = new Properties();
090    props.put(ConsumerConfig.BOOTSTRAP_SERVERS_CONFIG, trimmed);
091    props.put(ConsumerConfig.KEY_DESERIALIZER_CLASS_CONFIG, StringDeserializer.class.getName());
092    props.put(ConsumerConfig.VALUE_DESERIALIZER_CLASS_CONFIG, ByteArrayDeserializer.class.getName());
093    props.put(ConsumerConfig.GROUP_ID_CONFIG, "radar-assemble-" + UUID.randomUUID());
094    props.put(ConsumerConfig.AUTO_OFFSET_RESET_CONFIG, "earliest");
095    props.put(ConsumerConfig.ENABLE_AUTO_COMMIT_CONFIG, "true");
096    props.put(ConsumerConfig.MAX_POLL_RECORDS_CONFIG, 100);
097    return new KafkaConsumer<>(props);
098  }
099
100  private static SegmentRecord deserialize(byte[] payload) {
101    if (payload == null) {
102      throw new IllegalArgumentException("payload must not be null");
103    }
104    String json = new String(payload, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
105    long ts = extractLong(json, "ts");
106    String src = extractString(json, "src");
107    int sport = (int) extractLong(json, "sport");
108    String dst = extractString(json, "dst");
109    int dport = (int) extractLong(json, "dport");
110    long seq = extractLong(json, "seq");
111    int flags = (int) extractLong(json, "flags");
112    String payloadB64 = extractString(json, "payload");
113    byte[] data = payloadB64.isEmpty() ? new byte[0] : Base64.getDecoder().decode(payloadB64);
114    return new SegmentRecord(ts, src, sport, dst, dport, seq, flags, data);
115  }
116
117  private static long extractLong(String json, String key) {
118    String token = '"' + key + '"' + ":";
119    int idx = json.indexOf(token);
120    if (idx < 0) {
121      throw new IllegalArgumentException("Missing numeric field " + key);
122    }
123    int start = idx + token.length();
124    int end = start;
125    while (end < json.length() && (json.charAt(end) == '-' || Character.isDigit(json.charAt(end)))) {
126      end++;
127    }
128    if (end == start) {
129      throw new IllegalArgumentException("Empty numeric field " + key);
130    }
131    return Long.parseLong(json.substring(start, end));
132  }
133
134  private static String extractString(String json, String key) {
135    String token = '"' + key + '"' + ":";
136    int idx = json.indexOf(token);
137    if (idx < 0) {
138      throw new IllegalArgumentException("Missing string field " + key);
139    }
140    int startQuote = json.indexOf('"', idx + token.length());
141    if (startQuote < 0) {
142      throw new IllegalArgumentException("Malformed string field " + key);
143    }
144    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
145    boolean escaping = false;
146    for (int i = startQuote + 1; i < json.length(); i++) {
147      char c = json.charAt(i);
148      if (escaping) {
149        sb.append(c);
150        escaping = false;
151        continue;
152      }
153      if (c == '\\') {
154        escaping = true;
155        continue;
156      }
157      if (c == '"') {
158        break;
159      }
160      sb.append(c);
161    }
162    return sb.toString();
163  }
164
165  private static String sanitizeTopic(String topic) {
166    if (topic == null) {
167      throw new IllegalArgumentException("topic must not be null");
168    }
169    String trimmed = topic.trim();
170    if (trimmed.isEmpty()) {
171      throw new IllegalArgumentException("topic must not be blank");
172    }
173    return trimmed;
174  }
175}
176
177
178
